thread.title: Flames acquire center Freddie Hamilton from Avalanche
thread.title_full: Flames acquire center Freddie Hamilton from Avalanche

author: wtopstaff
title: Flames acquire center Freddie Hamilton from Avalanche
text:
Home » News » Sports » NHL » Flames acquire center Freddie… Flames acquire center Freddie Hamilton from Avalanche By The Associated Press October 4, 2015 8:45 pm 
CALGARY, Alberta (AP) — The Calgary Flames acquired center Freddie Hamilton from the Colorado Avalanche on Sunday for a conditional seventh-round pick next year. 
Hamilton will report to the Stockton Heat of the American Hockey League. 
The 23-year-old Hamilton appeared in 18 NHL games last season, going scoreless in one game for San Jose and scoring a goal in 17 games for Colorado. He also had two goals and two assists in five games for Lake Erie in the AHL. Topics:
